remarks: Subspace form of orthomodular law in the Hilbert lattice.  Compare the orthomodular law in Theorem 2(ii) of [Kalmbach] p. 22.  Derived using projections; compare ~ omlsi .  (Contributed by NM, 6-Nov-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjoml.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
pjoml.2 $e |- B e. SH $.
pjomli $p |- ( ( A C_ B /\ ( B i^i ( _|_ ` A ) ) = 0H ) -> A = B ) $.
